home.title: Welcome to LYNX
home.description: LYNX is a decentralized communication ecosystem powered by AI and DID technology.

about.title: About LYNX
about.description: LYNX aims to revolutionize digital identity and communication through decentralized protocols.
about.vision_description: To build a secure and user-controlled digital world using Web3 technologies.
about.commitment_description: We are committed to providing a secure and decentralized communication platform where users own their data and identity.
